text: wen wannata kalayayi dawase charikawa nima karamin pa.wa. 4.00 ta pamana api ihala kotte dumriya sthanayata langa wuna.

eheth pasu kalinawa abhayagiri wiharaya parani indiyawe pawathi nalanda, jagaddala, wikramashila wani bauddha wishwawidyala ha samakala haki thaththwayaka pawathi bawath mehi shakha aarama widesha ratawala pawa prachalithawa thibu bawath kiyawe.
prashnaya – shrilankawe atham deshapalagnyayin sathu bawa kiyana dubayi banku ginum gana wartha thibenawa.me gana kiyanna puluwanda?
ee athara gnyathihu ganinnansege upades anuwa pandamaka manawin thel galwa ehi mula mada aga yana sthana thune gal kata thunak thaba, thambaa thatiyak matha thaba dalwathi.
ema dumriya madiri nirathuruwama hala thibima samanya deyak bawata path wi atha.
kochchara hayiyen duwagena aawath udata aapu gaman nandage balu senawe tharjanayath ekka api galgahenawa.

thama kisida parajaya wanne yayi nosithu ku.pa.ma mahinda rajapaksha ewakawa hitapu janadhipathini chandrika bandaranayaka kumarathunga mahathmiyawa thathiganwima sandaha shreshtadhikaranaya haraha thinduwak labagaththe hitapu janadhipathiwarayakuta aarakshaka ansha samajikayan 30 deneku pamanak sitima pramanawath bawata sandahan karamini.

warthamana deshapalana sandarbhaya hamuwe mathuwa athi wyawasthanukula arbudaya wanne dewarak janadhipathi thanathura daru thanaththekuta parlimenthu manthriwarayaku bawata path wi agramathya thanathurata path wiya haki bawata balu balmata ida thibena bawaya.

sundara lanka lankawe usin hayaweniyata usama kanda thama gret westarn kiyanne.usin mitara 2212 yi.gret westarn wadiyen prasiddha wela thiyenne thalawakale nanuoya dumriyapalawal athara thiyena gret westarn dumriyapala nisa.badullata kochchiye yana oonama kenekuta dakinna puluwan lassanama dumriyapala thama me.la hiru rasin parisaraya nawena udasanaka samanala kanda itha apuruwata methanata penawa.ee wagema thawath kadupanthi kipayakuth methanata hodata penawa. ...	7
meke eka kawiyak damme na editarla sangarawe.
eheth me wana thek aarakshaka mandalika pradhani rawindra wijegunarathna mahatha sambandhayen ema nithiya balathmaka wi natha.
shri lankawe deshapalanaya sambandhayen mathuwa athi arbudakari thaththwaya thawaduratath ugra wemin pawathi.
nathnam kruthiye wishwasaniyathwaya nathiwenawa.

manda kanadawe batahira werala thirayada, samastha yuropayata ha japanaya wani ratawalata menma lokaye boho ratawala weralabada pradesha muhudata yatawana bawa mema aakarshaniya anagatha wakya pawasanna kiya thibe.
oya wachana deka kata padam koran inna oona.

sarath en silwa kiyana pudgalayage abhyanthara ha bahira swarupaya athara wishala wenasak thibena bawa me magin apata therum ganna puluwan.ada wanawita aanduwath, aanduwata hithawath anekuth parshwayanuth, sarath en silwa mahathata wiruddhawa digin digatama chodana ella karanne, ohu aanduwata wiruddhawa katha karana nisa kiyala samaharu chodana karanawa.sarath en silwa mahathata wiruddhawa mulinma chodana pathrayak gonu kale eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaya ho shrilanipaya nemeyi.

me mohothe muhammad (sal) thumananta (wakthruwarayeku wimata pera kalaye) madihath wi ema thathwaya samathayakata pathkirimata haki wuye ema samajaye ethumananta thibu prasiddhiya ha gaurawaya hethukotagenaya.

yauwana katayuthu ha nipunatha sanwardhana amathyanshaya saha adhyapana amathyanshaya ekwa me wadapiliwela kriyathmaka kere.me nawa wishaya dharawa me wasare mayi masa hadunwa dimata siyalu katayuthu sudanam kara athi bawa adhyapana amathya bandula gunawardhana mahatha prakasha kaleya.me wishaya dharawata injineru patamala ganananawak athulath bawa ki amathiwaraya motar ratha, siwil, ilektronik athulu patamala rasak usas pela sandaha hadunwa di athi bawa kiya.me patamala sandaha wishaya adala pela peth sakas karamin pawathina bawada amathi bandula gunawardhana mahatha kiweya.2015 wasaredi thakshanika wishaya dharawata anuwa usas pela sandaha idiripath wu sisunta wishwawidyala idakada laba dimata siyalu katayuthu sudanam kara athi bawada adhyapana amathiwaraya awadharanaya kaleya.me patamala awasanaye upadhi dakwa igenima labimata sisunta hakiyawa labena athara ee sandaha wruththiya wishwawidyala 25k diwayina pura aarambha kirimata niyamitha bawa yauwana katayuthu ha nipunatha sanwardhana amathi dalas alahapperuma mahatha me sambandhayen adahas dakwamin prakasha kaleya.amathiwarun me adahas pala kale eeye (11) ithihasaye palamu warata aarambha kala palamu pasal puhunu wruththiya eekakaya kolambaa aananda widuhal parishraye aarambha kirime awasthawata ek wemini..
1968 di pamana mathruwanshika nagenahira werala: arbudakari yugayaka athithakamaya saha pashchath athithakamaya -(2 kotasa)
agnyanawanthayin wana owunta gnyana pahala wanne kawadada ?

hithuwakkara kirillinumbaata yannama  oona namkadalle dora wiwara karannamithin yanna igillime wisal ahasa - manamala sina patharu asak ingimara bala hindinidahase sihinaye thurulu weminithin yanna igillihi sarin ruduru - hada bindi pera eda manga soya pala aa kadallenuhuru nam purudu ee unusuma dan  ithin yanna igillisathsara musuwa - stanli piriskatahanda - aasiri pa්riyantha mummullage.

mahindaya shrilanipa sabhapathi kama katta kamata dunnama maithri 62 lakshe amathaka karala eeke elluna. 19 sanshodhanaya diyaru karapu nisa wiganana panatha, thorathuru panathata ee de nowenna maha mathiwaranen passe genna thiranaya una.

‘rathupaswala, halawatha, katunayaka ape waradi’ – mathiwaranaya lan weddi basil siyalu paw wamarayi!
enam edina dahawala pasale kridabhara guruthuma samanga thama putha athulu lamun kandayamak hamuda kandawurata yana bawath, dina dekak ehi nawathi puhunuwa labana bawathya.
2002-2004 kalayedi eksath jathika pakshaye tharuna wruthiyawedikayinge sanwidhanaye sabhapathiwaraya lesa pathkaranu labanne ruwan wijayawardhana mahathayi.
e් widiyata rowar yanaya ewapu chayarupayak me dawaswala loku aාndolanayak aැthi karala thiyenawa.

dadi dushkaratha madhyaye athin wiyadam karagena fesbuk kriyawaliya sidu karagena yana bawath yam yam thakshanika dosha athi wima samanya thaththwayak bawath me awasthawedi fesbuk kandayama wishala kapa kirimak sidukarana bawath harin pranandu wisin penwa dena ladi.

dashaka kihipayak thisse deshiya ha wideshiya pura widyagnyayinge nomanda awadhanayata path wu ibbankatuwa megalithika susana bhumiya wasara kihipayak thisse widhimath sanrakshana wadapiliwelak nomathiwa winashayata lakwemin pawathi athara me pilibada wishesha awadhanaya yomu kala adhyapana amathya akila wiraj kariyawasam mahatha jathika uruma kalamanakarana wadasatahanak lesa meya sanrakshanaya kirimata piyawara ganna lesa adala niladharinta upades labadena ladi.

shri lankawa sambandhayen parikshana pawathwannata pathkara athi pudgalayan hata meratata paminennata ida denawada nathida yanna thindu kirime wagakima parlimenthuwata pawarimata thiranaya kara thibena bawa janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha pawasiya.merata yuda aparadha pilibanda soya balannata path kara athayi kiyana pudgalayaku mehi pamina ee sambandhayen soya balannata, parikshana karannata awasara illa athi bawa pawasu janadhipathiwaraya eeta ida denawada nadda yanna janathawa wenuwen peni sitina parlimenthuwen wimasa sitimata sudanam bawath prakasha kaleya.thrasthawadayen nidahas kara gath rata sanwardhanaya kara gena yama nisa masa hayen hayata jiniwa gos waga uththara bandinnata apata sidu wa athi bawa penwa dun janadhipathiwaraya dolarwalata yata wu piriswalata rata pawa dimata ida thabimata puluwankamak nomathi bawa awadharanaya kaleya.janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha mese prakasha kale madirigiriya jathika pasale mahindodaya thakshana widyagaraya eeye (10) wiwrutha kirimen anathuruwa pawathi janahamuwakata ekwemini.rata pura mahindodaya pasal dahasak sanwardhanaya kirime wadapiliwela yatathe idikerunu me widyagaraya anga sampurna ganithagarayakin, pariganaka 25 kin samanwitha bhashagarayakin, pariganaka 40 kin samanwitha pariganakagarayakin saha durastha igenum madhyasthanayakin samanwithaya.mahindodaya thakshana widyagaraya sisu ayithiyata pawara dun janadhipathithuma ehi nirikshana charikawakada niratha wemin sisunge adhyapana katayuthu pilibanda soya baluweya.
dewiyan wahanse aadam saha eewawa mawu awasthawedi owun sampurnayen wadunawu sanniwedanaya, samajaya saha sanwardhanaya aadiyata samartha wu manushyayan wuha (uthpaththi 2:19-25; 3:1-20; 4:1-12).
